text: I just looked up the cost of #Ivermectin (#Stromectol), and it goes from $1.30/pill - so, much cheaper than #remdesivir, and can be easily administered - I am still a HUGE advocate for #prevention & #EarlyTreatment, using the lowest dosage of #Chloroquine (the vanilla flavored)⚕️ https://t.co/hgTPPl1pES https://t.co/pTbe8JLRPB
